籤詩版本二:
Ndaqina umoya nemvula ndabuyela ekhaya, kodwa umzimba wam ufana nenkonjane
Ndibamba i-nio emlonyeni wam kwaye ndifuna ukwenza isiseko, kodwa isiphelo sesiseko siphukile kwaye iindevu zihlanganiswe ngodaka.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele umfanekiso wenkonjane ebambe iNi emlonyeni.
Yonke into inzima kwaye inzima.
解曰: Zonke iintlobo zamaqhinga. Ekuseni nangokuhlwa azipheli. Ngubani owaziyo oku. Ngapha koko, ngumsebenzi onzima.
籤詩故事一:
◇UDong Yong wangcwaba uyise
UDong Yong weHan Dynasty wayeyindoda yaseQiancheng. Intsapho yakhe yayingathathi ntweni yaye wafelwa ngunina eselula, ngoko kwafuneka ondle uyise yedwa.
Ukufa kukayise, uDong Yong wayengenamali yokumngcwaba, ngoko waboleka i-10,000 yeeyuan kwabanye ukuze angcwabe uyise. Kwixesha elizayo, ukuba andinayo imali yokubuyisela, ndiya kuba likhoboka. Suku ngalunye kufuneka baye kutheza umthwalo omnye weenkuni, imithwalo emine yamanzi, namagaba amasimi amasimi amathandathu okanye asixhenxe, nto leyo engumsebenzi onzima.
(Eli bali sisikweko sokusebenza nzima, kodwa akunanto iseleyo.)
聖意: Indlu iya kuba semngciphekweni kuqala kwaye emva koko kuya kuza okulungileyo.Kulumkele ukufuna ubutyebi, ube nesivumelwano, kwaye ube nomtshato.Indoda ehamba ngeenyawo uYoshida Canli, isilwanyana sesithandathu, iya kufunyanwa.Kuya kubakho ityala loluntu, kwaye kuya kubakho ukumangalelana.Ukufuduka, ukulahlekelwa yimpahla, ukugula, kunye neminqweno yentaba kunye nengcwaba yinto enhle.
